name: 4-7-8 Breathing (Relaxing Breath)
description: A natural tranquilizer for the nervous system. Inhale for 4, hold for 7, exhale for 8. This technique activates the parasympathetic nervous system, reducing stress and promoting sleep.

name: Box Breathing (Square Breathing)
description: Equal duration for inhale, hold, exhale, and hold again. Creates a 'box' pattern that helps regulate the nervous system and improve focus. Used by Navy SEALs and athletes.

name: Wim Hof Method
description: Powerful breathing technique combining deep breathing with breath retention. Increases energy, reduces stress, and improves cold tolerance. Popular for cold exposure and performance.

name: Alternate Nostril Breathing (Nadi Shodhana)
description: Balances the left and right hemispheres of the brain, calms the mind, and reduces anxiety. Traditional yoga technique for mental balance.

name: Kapalabhati (Skull Shining Breath)
description: Energizing breathing technique with forceful exhalations. Clears the mind and increases energy levels naturally. Great morning alternative to coffee.

name: Coherent Breathing
description: Slow, rhythmic breathing at 5-6 breaths per minute. Optimizes heart rate variability and promotes deep relaxation. Excellent for stress relief.

name: Diaphragmatic Breathing (Belly Breathing)
description: Deep breathing using the diaphragm. Reduces stress, improves oxygen intake, and promotes relaxation. Foundation for all breathing techniques.

name: Morning Energy Breath
description: Quick energizing sequence combining deep inhales with short holds. Natural alternative to coffee for morning energy and mental alertness.

name: Cold Shower Breathing
description: Controlled breathing technique to prepare for and endure cold exposure. Builds mental resilience and cold tolerance for cold showers and ice baths.

name: Focus Breathing
description: Concentration-enhancing breath pattern that improves mental clarity and attention span. Perfect for work, study, or any task requiring focus.

name: Anxiety Relief Breathing
description: Gentle breathing pattern specifically designed to reduce anxiety and panic symptoms. Calms the nervous system and promotes emotional balance.

name: Pre-Sleep Breathing
description: Slow, deep breathing pattern designed to activate the parasympathetic nervous system and prepare for sleep. Perfect for bedtime routine.
